page.title: 13RELIGION.
page.content: The major religion in this area is Catholicism.This was strengthened in 1792 when Thomas Weld (a former pupil) invited the Jesuits to move their College from Liege,in Belgium,to his large house at Stonyhurst. In 1832 the building of St.Peter's began.When it was consecrated in 1835 it was among the first post-reformation Catholic churches.It now has two satellite churches, St. Joseph's in Hurst Green and another at Dutton Lee. The Church of England has two churches nearby.St.John's in Hurst Green is just outside our block.All Hallows' church in Mitton is very old.
